--- drop_search_index_fqn.sql
DROP SEARCH INDEX AlbumSchema.AlbumsIndex

--- AST
&ast.DropSearchIndex{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 18,
        NameEnd: 29,
        Name:    "AlbumSchema",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 30,
        NameEnd: 41,
        Name:    "AlbumsIndex",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP SEARCH INDEX AlbumSchema.AlbumsIndex
